extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • DocumentListBuilder

        public DocumentListBuilder()

    • Method Detail

      • addDocument

        public void addDocument(ChunkDbIndexDocumentData newDocument)
        Adds the given document to be managed by this builder.
        Parameters:
        newDocument - The new document. Must not be null. Must have an open-ended validity range (i.e. must not have been terminated yet).
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown if this builder is already closed, i.e. getAllDocumentsAndClose() has already been invoked on it.

      • terminateDocumentValidity

        public void terminateDocumentValidity(ChunkDbIndexDocumentData document,
                                      long timestamp)
        Terminates the validity of the given document at the given timestamp.

        It is imperative that the given document was added before via addDocument(ChunkDbIndexDocumentData). Failing to do so will result in an IllegalArgumentException when calling this method.

        Parameters:
        document - The document. Must not be null. It must have an open-ended validity range (i.e. it must not have been terminated yet). Will be terminated by this method. Must have been added to this builder via addDocument(ChunkDbIndexDocumentData) first.
        timestamp - The timestamp at which to terminate the document validity. Must not be negative. Must be larger than the document's valid-from timestamp.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown if this builder is already closed, i.e. getAllDocumentsAndClose() has already been invoked on it.

      • getOpenDocuments

        public java.util.Set<ChunkDbIndexDocumentData> getOpenDocuments(java.lang.String keyspaceName,
                                                                java.lang.String key)
        Returns all open (i.e. non-terminated) ChunkDbIndexDocumentData elements that match the given keyspace and key.
        Parameters:
        keyspaceName - The keyspace to look for. Must not be null.
        key - The key to look for. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        An unmodifiable view on a set containing all matching documents. May be empty, but never null.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown if this builder is already closed, i.e. getAllDocumentsAndClose() has already been invoked on it.

      • getAllDocumentsAndClose

        public java.util.List<ChunkDbIndexDocumentData> getAllDocumentsAndClose()
        Returns the list of all documents registered at this builder.

        /!\ IMPORTANT WARNING /!\
        For efficiency reasons, this method returns the internal list representation, as copying could potentially be very expensive! It is imperative that this builder instance is discarded after calling this method! All methods of this object will throw an IllegalStateException after calling this method once.

        Returns:
        The (mutable) list of documents. May be empty, but never null.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown if this builder is already closed, i.e. getAllDocumentsAndClose() has already been invoked on it.
